alert.note: Alert for Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Teller and western El Paso Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cripple Creek, or 20 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Victor around 355 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
